location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Abraham Nickson Hojel, Bombay to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a recent conversation Hojel had with Sir Bartle Frere (Governor of Bombay) about the possibility of his being appointed to Bushire, a visit from Pelly's brother Augustus and news from Mrs Pelly (either Jane Billing Pelly or Deborah Morris Pelly both n√©e Morris and sisters of Hojel's wife Katherine Frances)
